title: The OCE eSports Team is looking for Shoutcasters!
body:
Hi Summoners!

With all the eSports happening in Oceania this year, we are looking for some aspiring Shoutcasters to come and help us with our upcoming Oceanic Challenger Series!

The selected shoutcasters will work with our current Commentators Pastrytime, Atlus, Spawn and Papasmithy to level up and hone their skills as shoutcasters before jumping into the big seat in our Sydney Studio on March 17 for the first day of the OCS.

Interested? Please send all the following information to oceanicrecruiting@riotgames.com. Please title the email ‘OCS Caster Application – ‘ followed by your name.

**Required information:
**
Name
Summoner Name
Age
City of residence

Please send an example of you shoutcasting a game. This can be anything from actual tournament shoutcasting to just you spectating a game and shoutcasting over it. Please upload the recording to YouTube and send us the link! (You can set it as unlisted if you don’t want other people watching it). We will only look at Vods that have been submitted from YouTube.

Finally be sure to tell us about yourself. This is open for you, but feel free to tell us about your experience on League or perhaps your favourite eSports league to watch or even some of your idols. We want to know who you are as a person and a gamer!

replies.body: Curses! Twitch has deleted so many of my past broadcasts! Time to go searching...
You know what, I'm gonna do a nice fresh one for you guys! Is there an estimate for a deadline?
get shooter williamson. id watch, this is him commentating some other sports https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G-Y08zYpJgA
I have a question about submissions in regards to examples. Can more than one be sent, aka portfolio of work so u can see a body of work.
There is not a deadline, we are looking at filling the position when we find the right casters. We will be evaluating them as they come in.
I imagine you'll have your choice some time before March 17th though?

Is there a deadline? I've recently had surgery done and so I can't really talk let alone shoutcast at the moment but I'd love to give it a go. I hope I recover in time in the case that there is a deadline!

I would like to know this too. I reckon I've got a fairly good shot, but I have an exam on Thursday and then am going away for the weekend without internet access. I probably wouldn't be able to get an application in until the end of next week at the earliest.
#\#HireElfishguy2k15
Is it still on? possibly???
Hey, am i too late to apply for this?
I wish I could... When I went to upload, Time remaining: 2980 minutes. Well that absolutely sucks... Rip my chances of ever being in the Esports scene. {{item:3070}}
Shame that they only take Youtube vods D: Got plenty of Gamestah that I could use haha, guess I'll have to look at a few older twitch channels and hope to find some of past broadcasts xD

I know your pain. As onsite caster I almost never record myself so all my content is to be found on twitch. So what I did was recording a twitch recording to be able to put some stuff on youtube lol. Hope it teases them enough to dare and click the twitch links ;)
I'd be lying if I said I wasn't interested. Lack of experience would probably be a bit of a problem though.
you can do it!
I'd submit if i had a decent quality Microphone. The thing i have right now picks up everything around me and its difficult for mates to hear me speak on Skype so i guess i'm out.

BRING A KOREAN RITO.

HIRE A KOREAN.

It'll make OCE popular af.

Linton Davidson
MLG Sho3z Senpai
23
SYDNEY
